model.paint

Class ImagePaintStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.paint.APaintStrategy
      • model.paint.ImagePaintStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IPaintStrategy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    UprightImagePaintStrategy

    public class ImagePaintStrategy
extends APaintStrategy
    Paint strategy that paints an image from a file, scaled to the host Ball's radius. Note that this class cannot be used by the BallWar system directly as it is lacking a no-parameter constructor.
    Author:
    Suozhi Qi, Zhou Liu

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private double fillFactor
      The percentage of the average of the width and height of the image that defines a unit radius for the image.
      private java.awt.Image image
      The image to paint
      private java.awt.image.ImageObserver imageObs
      ImageObserver needed for some image operations
      (package private) java.awt.geom.AffineTransform localAT
      A local affine transform used to transform the image into its unit size and location.
      private double scaleFactor
      Ratio of the unit radius circle to the effective radius size of the image.
      (package private) java.awt.geom.AffineTransform tempAT

        at
